name: Furious Shark Revolution: Play this Shark Life Simulator to feed and hunt
name_original: Furious Shark Revolution: Play this Shark Life Simulator to feed and hunt
description:
This game gives you a chance to take peek in this angry sharks life, what is her life alike, what she do when hungry, when she do when angry. She keeps going out there in the open waters, keep hunting for food, kill for defense, or to satisfy the hunger this shark has.


Open ocean with beach environment
Real life shark simulator
Play with shark missions or endless
Keep hunting to get more missions
Learn what is to be in body of a hungry shark

this game support ads.
